titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 366: Kitāb fī masāʼil fiqhīyah.

note: Title supplied from note laid in.
Kitāb fī masāʼil fiqhīyah nāqiṣ al-awwal wa-al-ākhir maktūb ṭiwāla 1200 H. (note in pencil laid in).

msContents.summary: Summary of points of Islamic law, dealing with acts of worship (ʻibādāt) including ablution, prayer, and fasting; the copy is missing both the beginning and the end. Pages are fragile, the copy is quite worm damaged and damp stained. Invocation in a different hand added at the end (f. 68v-69r).

supportDesc.extent: 69 leaves : 188 x 127 (152 x 80) mm, bound to 210 x 132 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed, vocalized.

binding.p: Bound in quarter covers of red paper over pulpboard decorated with red and white flower patterns; red leather spine; fore-edge and bottom edge are cut raggedly.

origin.p: Item is undated, but likely copied in the mid-18th to mid-19th century.
